  • Classes in it.polimi.ingsw.game_model.utils used by it.polimi.ingsw.game_model
    Class
    Description
    CalculatorInfluence
    Class used to calculate the player's influence on an island: influence is an integer which depends on towers on islands and students on island whose professor is in the player's game board.
    CalculatorTeacherOwnership
    A class to manage teacher ownership in the game: if a player has the highest number of students of a specific color on its dining table, player owns the teacher of that specific color
    ColorCharacter
    Object to represent students colors.
    ColorTower
    Object that represents towers possible colors
    GamePhase
    Enum object to represent game playing phases
